projects.title: Projects
projects.pacto.title: Pacto: Smart Contract Management with Blockchain
projects.pacto.description: Web platform simplifying smart contract creation and management. It uses blockchain to automate contractual flows, offering security and decentralization.
projects.mobile_academic.title: Mobile Academic Management
projects.mobile_academic.description: Android mobile app to optimize academic management. It allows controlling subjects, scanning QR for attendance, and checking grades, automating academic control.
projects.cultivo_sano.title: Cultivo Sano: Plant Disease Detection
projects.cultivo_sano.description: iOS mobile app using computer vision for early and accurate plant disease detection. It empowers rural communities with fast, reliable diagnoses, improving crop health.

projects.iot_monitoring.description: IoT system monitoring real-time temperature and sending automated WhatsApp alerts. It optimizes industrial processes by preventing overheating and reducing non-productive time.
projects.cine_series_hub.title: Cine & Series Hub
projects.cine_series_hub.description: Mobile app integrating the TMDb API to explore movies and series. It offers a favorites system and intuitive navigation for a fluid user experience.
projects.inclusive_reservation.title: Inclusive Real-time Booking Web Platform
projects.inclusive_reservation.descripti: Web platform with a real-time booking system, service profiles, and automated reminders. Its inclusive design ensures full accessibility for all users.
projects.sms_encryption.title: SMS Encryption using RSA and SSL/TLS Analysis
projects.sms_encryption.description: Android messaging app with RSA encryption for secure SMS communications. It ensures message privacy and authentication, optimizing decryption performance.
projects.ml_travel_prediction.title: Travel Cancellation Prediction using Machine Learning
projects.ml_travel_prediction.descriptio: Machine Learning system predicting travel cancellations. It analyzes historical data to offer accurate predictions and optimize reservation management.
projects.parking_system.title: Parking Management System
projects.parking_system.description: Multi-platform mobile app optimizing university parking. It displays real-time space availability and allows reservations, improving campus efficiency.
projects.cancer_support_app.title: Support Application for Oncology Patients
projects.cancer_support_app.description: Multi-platform mobile app offering personalized emotional support to oncology patients. It integrates an AI-powered chatbot to provide companionship and resources.
projects.sql_transaction_system.title: SQL Transaction Management System
projects.sql_transaction_system.descript: Transaction management app with a graphical interface optimizing database operations. It supports high transaction volume, ensuring data integrity and efficiency.
projects.super_mario_bros.title: Super Mario Bros (Recreation)
projects.super_mario_bros.description: Retro platformer game recreating the classic Super Mario Bros experience. It offers dynamic level design and responsive controls for authentic gameplay.
projects.vending_machine_logic.title: Vending Machine Logic (VHDL)
projects.vending_machine_logic.descripti: Implementation of control logic for a vending machine. It uses VHDL and digital circuits to process payments and dispense products with high reliability.
projects.stemify.title: STEMify: STEM Career Guidance
projects.stemify.description: iOS mobile app guiding youth towards STEM careers through guided curiosity, gamification, and role model inspiration. Features university geolocation, web scraping, and custom flows.
